HotelElement.Name: Wyndham Grand Istanbul Kalamis Marina Hotel

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Wyndham Grand Istanbul Kalamis Marina Hotel in Istanbul (Kadikoy), you'll be minutes from Kalamis and Fenerbahce Marina and close to Sukru Saracoglu Stadium. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Moda Quay and Sureyya Opera House.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 210 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and minibars. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 32-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and body treatments. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an indoor pool and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 5 restaurants and 3 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Wyndham Grand Istanbul Kalamis Marina Hotel in Istanbul (Kadikoy), you'll be minutes from Kalamıs and Fenerbahce Marina and close to Sukru Saracoglu Stadium. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Moda Quay and Sureyya Opera House.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kalamis and Fenerbahce Marina - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Sukru Saracoglu Stadium - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Moda Quay - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Sureyya Opera House - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Kadikoy Port - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Turkbalon - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Istanbul Toy Museum - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Florence Nightingale Museum - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi
Optimum Shopping Mall - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Suadiye Beach - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Capitol Mall - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Cinili Bath - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Palladium Shopping Mall - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Bostanci Port - 5.2 km / 3.3 mi
Ayse Sultan Fountain - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi

The preferred airport for Wyndham Grand Istanbul Kalamis Marina Hotel is Istanbul (IST-Ataturk Intl.) - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
